title: Express Talk: Cauleen Smith
hero_caption: <p>Cauleen Smith, <em>The Fire Next Time, from Human_3.0 Reading List</em>, 2015. Promised gift of Helen and Sam Zell.</p>
description:
Join academic curator Felicia Mings for an in-gallery discussion about the exhibition, Cauleen Smith: Human_3.0 Reading List, featuring 57 drawings of book covers. Together the drawings ask challenging questions: Have you read these books? Will you read these books? What will they mean to you? What do they mean to us now?

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
